recipe.title: Cranberry Relish with Apple Cider
ingredients: 1 medium Granny Smith apple, peeled, cored, diced
instructions: Boil apple cider in heavy small saucepan until reduced to generous 1/2 cup, about 15 minutes. Add sugar; stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves. Transfer to bowl and chill until cold, about 1 hour.

Using on/off turns, coarsely chop cranberries, apple, and lemon peel in processor. Add cider syrup; using on/off turns, chop finely. Transfer to bowl. Cover and chill overnight. DO AHEAD: Can be made 2 days ahead. Keep chilled. Bring to room temperature before serving.
Stir in chopped parsley and serve.
